DOC.detailed_description: As novel minimally invasive approach , microneedle-mediated transdermal drug delivery receive increased attention . Microneedle patch effectively penetrate skin barrier stratum corneum create efficient pathway delivery drug . A randomized control trial base split-body plan evaluate efficacy enhance transdermal delivery topical agent hyaluronic acid ( HA ) -fabricated microneedle patch psoriatic plaque . Six psoriatic plaque patient randomize either microneedle HA patch , patch , control group . Patch group plan rule occlusion effect patch . All lesion treat topical agent patch daily 2-week period . The severity psoriasis grate modified PASI score clinical improvement assess % baseline every week . Overall 20 patient 120 psoriatic plaque enrol .
